A4.text: hits such as 'This Town Ain't Big Enough for Both of Us', 'Amateur Hour' and 'Never Turn Your Back on Mother Earth' led to many appearances on the BBC's flagship record chart television programme Top of the Pops.

A5.text: It spawned two singles in the top-fifteen UK chart: 'The Number One Song in Heaven' and 'Beat the Clock'.
